text: beshak un logon ne apana sakht ghaata kiya aur jo ifatera paradaaziya kiya karate the vah sab gaayab (galla) ho gayeen beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar khuda hee hai jisake (sirph) 6 dinon mein aasamaan aur zameen ko paida kiya phir arsh ke banaane par aamaada hua vahee raat ko din ka libaas pahanaata hai to (goya) raat din ko peechhe peechhe tezee se dhoondhatee phiratee hai aur usee ne aafataab aur maahataab aur sitaaron ko paida kiya ki ye sab ke sab usee ke hukm ke taabedaar hain
